## Quality checklist

- [ ] `npm run typecheck` passed
- [ ] `npm run build` passed

## Web quality checklist (if applicable)

- [ ] Accessibility reviewed (keyboard/focus/contrast/labels)
- [ ] Performance impact reviewed (image size, rendering, bundle)
- [ ] SEO/AEO metadata updated (title, description, schema, structured content)
- [ ] Copy reviewed for clarity + CTA
